{"id":599300810,"lang":"java","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1639043133,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/599300810/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"38.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxPower(String s) {\n        int[] left = new int[s.length()];\n        int[] right = new int[s.length()];\n        left[0] =1;\n        right[s.length()-1] =1;\n        int max =0;\n        int n = s.length();\n        for (int i =1; i<n; i++){\n            left[i] = (s.charAt(i-1)==s.charAt(i))? left[i-1]+1:1;\n        }\n        for (int j =0; j<n-1; j++){\n            right[j] = (s.charAt(j)== s.charAt(j+1))? right[j+1]+1: 1;\n        }\n        for (int i =0; i<n; i++){\n            max = Math.max(max, left[i]+ right[i]-1);\n        }\n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters"}
